Summary: Brooklyn UFO sighting of large Black Disk
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend went outside his house by Kings Plaza mall in Brooklyn, it hadlust rained. a little cloudy and some lightning in the distance. We saw the skylight up from a lightning bolt and we saw a black circle iun the sky, my friendbrought it to my attention and asked me if I saw it. I thought it was a fighterjet cause it made a rumble but it got above us at one point and it was black anda perfect circle, we dicdnt understand what we were seeing. It was trveling in astraight line, he called his little sister outside and she looked at it to. Itchanged directions and headed staright up really fast. It slowed down, went in adifferent direction and started going so high we couldnt see it. It went behindsome clouds.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around August 16th 2003
